examples.text: why is EVA advantageous to use?
what are the advantages of the enhanced conversation asset?
what is the value of eva?
Can you give me some advice?
What can you do to help me?
What subjects are you dealing with?
Exactly what can you help with?
What are you supposed to do?
What type of information can you tell me?
What kind of information can you provide?
Can you please send me an overview of what topics we can talk about?
Could you give me some advice?
Can you clarify something for me?
What kinds of things do you know?
What topics can we talk about Eva?
Why are you answering my questions?
What else can you talk about?
Unfortunately that has slipped my mind
slipped in one ear and out the other
I was referencing the expensive listing
do you have a special price for students?
Tell me more about the Samsung
how much notice do you have to give for this contract?
how easy is it to cancel?
and when is the contract extended
I was talking about the previous offer
how long does the basic contract last?
do you know what IBM is?
ibm stands for international business machines
What is the single word search?
Thank you for the advice, I am all set
I think I have asked all the questions
I don't have any remaining questions
I need to head out now
Thank you very much for the information and goodbye
Now I have everything I need
I can't think of anything else
Thank you, I don't have any more questions
I hope you have a great day!
I have all the information I need, thank you
What do I do when you cannot further help?
why don't you know the answer
Why am I not getting any answers?
I am tired of your questions
You are not understanding any of my questions
this is a waste of time
You didn't help me at all
that is something I didn't want to know
EVA, you are not helping me anymore
I think you are really stupid
that answer is not very convincing
That wasn't what I was asking about
Can you please answer my question?
I don't want to talk to a call center
I was asking about something else
that is a bunch of garbage
that is no help to me now
that is not what i meant
How often should I go to church?

And then I found five dollars

How do you know so much?

I am not doing so well

Wait, there is still something I would like to know

I still have a couple questions
